attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
James Toseland this year won his second World Superbike Championship.  This achivement went virtual un-noticed in the UK press, even though 125,000 people attended Brands Hatch to see him win his first double race win. 

He is now moving on to MotoGP for new challenges and prove himself against the some of the best riders in the world.

James is our best hope of success in the elite class since Barry Sheene.

I think James' achievements so far should be recognised by those outside of the biking community.
